modules.nlg.templates.preprocessing module¶

modules.nlg.templates.templatefile module¶

class TemplateFile(filename: str, domain: utils.domain.jsonlookupdomain.JSONLookupDomain)[source]¶

Bases: object

Interprets a template file

global_memory {GlobalMemory} -- memory that can be accessed at all times in the tempaltes
add_python_function(function_name: str, python_function: Callable[[object], str], obligatory_arguments: List[object] = [])[source]¶

Add a python function to the global memory of the template file interpreter

Parameters

  • {str} -- name under which the function can be accessed in template file (function_name) –

  • {Callable[[object], str]} -- python function which is called when being (python_function) – accessed in the template file

Keyword Arguments

{List[object]} -- objects that are always passed as first (obligatory_arguments) – arguments to the python function, e.g. “self” (default: {[]})

create_message(sys_act: utils.sysact.SysAct) → str[source]¶

Iterates through all possible templates and applies the first one to fit the system act

Parameters

{SysAct} -- the system act to find a template for (sys_act) –

Raises

BaseException – when no template could be applied

Returns

str – the message returned by the template
